description:
Amazon's API tells that it has MaxResults and NextToken tags for pagination. There is no such thing in our API
http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/APIReference/ApiReference-query-DescribeTags.html
title: Pagination not implemented for DescribeTags

comments.content:
